trans-unit.source: Can be used with the "jQuery-FractionSlider", the "Professional jQuery Content Slider Plugin - Slider Pro" or the "Slider revolution".
data-position attribute. Format: “top,left” in pixels. E.g. 100,500. [px,px]
data-ease-in attribute. E.g. linear, swing or easeInBack.
data-ease-out attribute. E.g. linear, swing or easeOutBack.
data-delay attribute: time before the in transition starts (in the current step). [ms]
data-time attribute: time after which the elements animation is complete. [ms]
data-step attribute: you can group your elements in different steps.
data-special attribute: cycle will trigger the out transition for the previous element in the current step.
